originalText: xpbl_mu_eustace
Start Element
eustace
Exit's... ::wheeze:: that way.
Wesley's... ::wheeze:: downstairs. Straight... ::sniff:: then down the stairs. ::wheeze::

::You see a dried up, wiry mutie with noticeably bulging eyes. He is quick to inspect you, but slow to respond and does so with reservations.::

What do... ::wheeze:: you want?
Hey. ::wheeze:: Hey.
::sniff::
Me - Eustace. ::wheeze::
::Tenses up his neck muscles, gurgles briefly, then swallows.::
You-- ::sniff:: sure are... ::gurgle:: a big one.
You... ::wheeze:: boy or girl? ::sniff.::
context.npc_xpbl_wesley_met

::The last word of his question is accented by a scent most resembling that of fermented fish. He continues.::

Uh: Need. ::cough:: What do you... ::wheeze:: need?
context.npc_mu_eustace_met
Hey... um... ::wheeze:: thanks for what you... ::sniff:: did for us. I got some... ::cough:: extra items I could... ::sniff:: sell you. I wasn't plannin' on... Wanna see... ::gurgle:: it?

::He tenses up his neck muscles, gurgles briefly, then swallows.::

What? ::wheeze:: ...Can I do for you? ::sniff::

::He coughs so violently that his eyes seem like they're going to pop out; one of them even enters a cycle of intense twitching which lasts longer than any sane person would want.::

Yeah? ::wheeze::

::He rubs his forehead.::

Hnnnn... one... second...

::It takes him about ten instead, after whose expiration he sighs in relief and looks at you.::

Where... ::wheeze:: were we?
Hey... ::wheeze:: the headaches... ::wheeze:: have stopped. ::His eye twitches.::

::He peels a strip of skin from his forearm and puts it in a yellowish nylon bag.::

What is-- ::wheeze:: What can I do for you?
What do you... ::wheeze:: *need*?
Sure. ::Barter.::
I wanted to ask you something first.
Show me what you got. ::Barter.::
English
Show me what you got. ::Barter.::
Who are you?
What do you do around here?
So, are there any outsiders you trade with?
What can you tell me about the Ferryman?
What kinds of things does the Ferryman bring for trade?
Do you know the Ferryman's sailing route?
What was the Ferryman's route, again?
Any points of interests nearby?
About the surrounding areas...
Can you tell me anything about the local wildlife?
That monolith at the entrance, what do you know about it?
I have to go now.
::Wheeze::
Eustace. ::wheeze:: You?

Stuff. ::wheeze:: I do a lot of stuff. ::He observes you, continuing soon after.:: Huntin'. ::He pauses.:: Makin' traps, bolts... ::Another pause.:: 

If you're lookin' for someone to trade with... ::wheeze:: then you're talkin' to the right... ::coughs:: mutie. ::He almost smiles.::
Uh,,,
Yeah... ::wheeze:: but it ain't with the pirates or the Serpentines. Mutual dislike. ::wheeze:: There is only one outsider that comes here.
He's an old gentleman... ::sniff:: sailin' the sea... ::wheeze:: and scavengin' for stuff. He trades with us some of it, yeah. He's kind to us. ::He nods, his eyes following with a delay.::
To us... ::wheeze:: meat, mushrooms, hides... materials. But... ::sniff:: he also finds pretty and odd things.
Uh... so-so. He has... a fairly... ::wheeze:: regular route.
I know... ::sniff:: nothin'.
Startin' with our place... ::wheeze:: his next stop is usually The Pirate Bay, then he... ::gurgle:: sails north again.
There are a few... ::wheeze:: places.
Wouldn't know... ::wheeze::
Questions? ::wheeze::

Serpents... ::wheeze:: rule the sea. 

Crabs rule... ::sniff:: the sands. 

Siphoners rule the... ::cough:: pools. 

Creepers - the dark caves... ::wheeze::
It's been there since we... ::wheeze:: came. Ain't got the faintest what it... ::sniff:: is or does.
$(context.player.Name). Nice to meet you.
$(context.player.Name).
I got some... ::wheeze:: huntin' gear and leather... if you're interested.
Ferryman?
::Wait.::
Well?
Spit it out.
The Ferryman?
Who is it?
Anything else you can tell me about him?
Example?
A guess is better than nothing.
Even if I knew... ::wheeze:: the Ferryman wouldn't... ::cough:: appreciate it. Nah.
I think he mentioned the... ::sniff:: "northeastern waters" a couple of... ::wheeze:: times. Then he comes back here, and... ::cough:: again and again.
Like?
This is the... ::sniff:: most borin' part of the Black Sea... ::wheeze:: for sure.
Heard plenty of stories... ::wheeze:: But I don't know. However... ::sniff:: the Serpentines... they fear it. ::wheeze:: Scares the... ::sniff:: crap outta them.
It's just there... ::wheeze:: and you stop payin' attention to it after a while.
::He nods.:: Yeah.

::His eyes pop out even further.::

Ferryman... yeah, yeah... ::sniff:: Only... ::wheeze:: him.
I can't... ::sniff:: answer that. ::cough::
You got it. ::wheeze::
The Ferryman.
English

Um... sure. ::He hesistates for a second, his eye darting across the room. Such rapid movement gives them an odd floaty appearance, as though they are two lubricated balls moving freely in their sockets.::
Nah. ::sniff:: He doesn't like bein' talked... ::wheeze:: about. Or to, dependin' on who's... ::cough:: doin' the talkin'.
One time he had... ::wheeze:: this rock thingy. One side... ::sniff:: was rock, the other was crystal. Small thingy. He wouldn't trade it, though... ::cough:: I just saw him look at it.
Like... the siphoner pools... ::wheeze:: the hopper island... Red Line, although that ain't quite so near.
Tell me about the siphoner pools.
Hopper island. Tell me about it.
The Red Line?
What do you know about the Fetid Marsh?
What about this island?
What do you know about the expedition?
What do you know about the pirate territory?
Tell me about the native territory.
I have no more questions.
You have hoppers here?
Tell me about the crabs.
These serpents...
What can you tell me about the local siphoners?
Creepers?
Let me ask you something else.
How come?
He's alone... ::sniff:: out there, you know. All by himself. And he's... ::wheeze:: got lots of time to think about, uh, life, the world - existence.
He finds other things as well... ::cough:: like ancient jewelery, pretty pieces... ::sniff:: of statues and art.
Just west of here... ::cough:: in a small cave. The siphoners are spawnin' like... ::wheeze:: crazy there 'cause it's rich in fish... ::wheeze:: especially if you venture further in. ::wheeze::

It's north of here. ::wheeze:: Not much on the surface, but there's a... ::sniff:: creeper nest underneath. Pirates of old used to stash loot... ::wheeze:: there before the buggers moved in. The Jetters visit it... ::wheeze:: so there's gotta be somethin' still there.
::He points northeast.:: There, in the distance... ::wheeze:: there is a shore. Red 'cause of the red reeds growin' on it. That's... ::wheeze:: the Red Line.

If memory serves... ::sniff:: the Ferryman spoke... ::wheeze:: about a foul-smellin' mist permeatin' the area. The Marsh has... ::wheeze:: venomous buggers livin' in it. Sometimes... the water brings their carcasses... ::sniff:: all the way to here. Ugly buggers.

Nothin' much here... ::wheeze:: Interestin'. This used to be a warehouse of some kind... ::wheeze:: Easy to tell. The only interestin' thing... ::wheeze:: is that the ground in front of the warehouse has been slowly sinkin' for years. It'll get completely submerged soon, I reckon. ::wheeze::
The newcomers? They came here... ::wheeze:: about two weeks ago, armed... ::wheeze:: and ready. Set up... ::sniff:: camp on the island to the east, but no one... ::wheeze:: likes their new neighbors.
Uh... ain't you... ::sniff:: supposed to know more... ::wheeze:: about that than me?

It's The Pirate Bay... ::wheeze:: Many generations of pirates have been... ::cough:: there, in the past. Before they built the walls... ::sniffs:: you could see a huge battleship... ::wheeze:: but no more.
The Serpentines... ::wheeze:: rule everythin' north of here. Unlike

Uh... yeah. ::He nods, wheezing.:: They've been brought here a long time ago... ::wheeze:: 'cause they're easy to keep. But they... ::sniff:: kept dyin' in captivity. ::wheeze:: It's us, I guess. So we let them inhabit the surroundin' lands... ::wheeze::
Forget I said anythin'.
Burrow under the... ::wheeze:: sand. Then they... ::sniff:: burst out to getcha. The big buggers do... ::wheeze:: the small ones can't hurt you.
Dangerous. They ain't got the taste for us... ::wheeze:: luckily, so they don't linger... ::sniff:: around this island.
There are lesser ones... ::wheeze:: and there are greater ones... Pretty much the same things other than size... ::wheeze:: The greater ones taste a bit better, though.
Giant spiders. ::wheeze:: Web-weavin' buggers. Their venom can blind... ::wheeze:: you.

They avoid it like leprosy... ::sniff:: even cover their eyes as to not look at it. ::wheeze:: And if the currents bring their boats close... ::sniff:: they start frantically rowin'... ::wheeze:: back. You can just see it. Frantically, yeah. ::cough::
Tell me more.
We rarely go too deep... ::wheeze:: 'cause of greater siphoners. Tough critters.
We don't go there... ::wheeze:: all that often any more... ::He scrathes a wrinkly patch on his head.:: Rarely after the incident...
And what's behind the Red Line?
But they make some kinda... ::wheeze:: glowin' honey. He, the Ferryman, trades it with us... ::wheeze:: It
But the honey...
What did you find in the warehouse when you arrived here?
They packed their... ::gurgle:: bags and left... ::wheeze:: so
Since... the Serpentines... ::wheeze:: wiped them out... ::sniff::
The Serpentines... ::wheeze:: are in a war with them now... and
context.npc_mu_entrance_identifiedAs
pirate
Yeah. ::cough::
Now it's nothin' but... ::wheeze:: walls and jetters patrollin'. That's all you can... ::sniff:: see.
your mates... ::wheeze::
the pirates
They haven't spread far, though. ::wheeze:: Lotsa hungry critters 'round here.
::Wheeze::
But the big ones... some can even zap ya. ::wheeze:: BzzZzz! And you're... ::cough:: dead.
But they love... ::wheeze::
Or so they... ::wheeze:: told me. I can't taste nothin'.
There's a nest nearby... ::wheeze:: They moved in to eat... ::wheeze:: our hoppers. Huge nest... ::wheeze:: underground.

Well, uh... um... I can't grasp a lot of what... ::wheeze:: he says - and he doesn't talk often - but it's often concerned... with the decline of... ::cough:: everythin', really. Civilizations, values... ::wheeze:: people.
What incident?
Muties don't go there... ::cough:: but the Ferryman does. He told me about - what was it...- ::sniff:: the Fetid... ::wheeze:: Marsh.
makes the body... ::wheeze:: feel good, yeah. ::sniff::

Well, I wasn't here with the first settlers... ::wheeze:: I arrived about sixty years ago... ::sniff:: so I didn't get to see the warehouse in its original condition. But from the stories... ::wheeze:: I've heard, there was all sorts of things in here, like... ::sniff:: various mechanical parts, electronic components... ::wheeze:: tools, materials.
I... ::cough:: can't talk about that.
they ain't gonna bother no one anymore.
your mates
the pirates

they ain't got fast movin'... ::wheeze:: jets to chase after you. But they... ::wheeze:: got huge ships made of bone... ::sniff:: and leather. And they got natural... ::wheeze:: predators guardin' their waters.
your friends on... ::cough:: jets.
the newcomers on... ::cough:: jets.
He's damn right.
The world has always been like this, it's just that people remember the good things in the past and compare it to the wholeness of the present.
The world is perfect as it is.

Well... ::wheeze:: once the buggers came we started huntin' hoppers... ::wheeze:: in groups. We always had a spotter... ::sniff:: to look out for anythin' comin' outta their nest. One time... Five Fingers was the spotter.

That's only on the top two levels... ::wheeze:: no one ever went deeper. Some of this... ::wheeze:: stuff was in bad condition 'cause of moisture... corrosion, but what was good was either used in creatin' the refuge or was... traded.
have shown their... ::wheeze:: displeasure on numerous... ::sniff:: occasions.
The Ferryman... has been there. No one... ::wheeze:: else. No one else... ::cough:: and came back alive.
Pirates... ::wheeze:: too. They're fast... and got a real nasty bite. ::wheeze:: All of 'em.
Your mates too.

It is his... ::cough:: ideas about why all those things... ::wheeze:: are like that that's confusin'. Open spaces above the ceilin', travelin' down, irrelevance of time. I... it's too much for poor Eustace. ::gurgles::
He had five fingers on his hand, plus the thumb?
He had five fingers on each of his hands, plus the thumbs?
He had five fingers in total?
And?
Why didn't anyone go there?
What's on the island?
No. He had five fingers in total.
Five in total.

Five Fingers fell asleep and... ::wheeze:: got devoured by the buggers. Another mutie, Rags, got snatched too, as... ::wheeze:: there was no spotter to warn him. ::cough:: All we found of him was an undeployed bear trap.
Well... ::wheeze:: actually they did. And they didn't come back. ::wheeze:: There you go.
Ruins. ::wheeze:: There's a couple large buildings there. Everythin' else... ::cough:: is rubble.
Used to be Six Fingers, but that... ::wheeze:: didn't work out. ::He almost smiles.::
It's become too dangerous, so we... ::sniff:: rarely go there now... ::wheeze:: And if we do... we bring lotsa guns.
There's somethin' down there for sure. ::wheeze:: If you stand by the crane shaft... ::sniff:: you can hear things movin' down there.
How come the pirates never set up camp over there?
Anyways... ::wheeze::
Crane shaft?
Some have tried... ::wheeze:: but the... ::sniff:: Serpentines drove them out.
Yeah, just over there... ::He points northeast.:: That room in the corner.
Some folks used... ::wheeze:: to sleep near it. ::He shivers, which causes his eyes to twitch independently in rhythm for a few seconds.::
